description:
NEW STYLE RHYTHM GAME! FEEL THE RHYTHM WHILE LAYING BEAT-DOWNS ON THE BAD GUYS!

A popular radio station spreading its love of groove with some the best DJs in the world. Providing tunes to groove to throughout the day. 
Its true purpose is to serve as the radio station of justice, beating evil down with a ginormous hammer! 
To ensure peace and harmony, RADIOHAMMER STATION continues to go live with style!
name: RADIOHAMMER STATION
